loadPostings

public static void loadPostings(String path,
                                FileSystem fs,
                                CompressedPostings[] postings,
                                int[] dfs)
                         throws IOException,
                                ClassNotFoundException
Loads an entire collection of postings lists and initializes the given ranker with this collection.

Parameters:
path - Path to the root of the postings list
fs - File system
postings - Array of CompressedPostings to initialize
dfs - Array of integers to be initialized (this represents Document Frequencies)
Throws:
IOException
ClassNotFoundException

public static int readNumberOfTerms(String path,
                                    FileSystem fs)
                             throws IOException,
                                    ClassNotFoundException
Reads the number of terms from an index

Parameters:
path - Path to the root of the postings list
fs - File system
Returns:
Number of terms in the index (i.e., number of postings lists)
Throws:
IOException
ClassNotFoundException

writePostings

public static void writePostings(String outputPath,
                                 FileSystem fs,
                                 RetrievalEnvironment env,
                                 String spamScoresPath)
                          throws IOException
Converts the postings of a collection into CompressedPostings and writes them to disk.

Parameters:
outputPath - Root path to store the output in
fs - File system
env - A retrieval environment
spamScoresPath - Path to spam/quality scores
Throws:
IOException
